name: 2022 International Conference on Agricultural and Food Science (6th ICAFS 2022)
content:
Dear Friends and Colleagues, 

 On behalf of the Organizing Committee, it is our great pleasure to welcome you to participate the [**2022 The 6th International Conference on Agricultural and Food Science** (6th ICAFS 2022)](https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/) to be held **virtual online during September 28-30**, 2022\. (>>[General Information](https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/about/)). 
 For more details about ICAFS 2022, please visit the website at <https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg>/ . The information of ICAFS 2021 are archived here at <https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/2021/>. 
 
_**Organizers**_

 The conference is organized by Asia-Pacific Association of Science Engineering and Technology, in cooperation with multiple academic affiliations. 
 
_**Topics**_ 
 It has been designed to provide an innovative and comprehensive overview of agricultural and food science. A focus will be given on: plant sciences; agronomy and agricultural sciences; Soil & Environmental Science; Food science and technology; agricultural environment, ecology and resources, etc. ([\>>More topics](https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/about/#topics)). 
 
_**Previous**_ 
 All previous conference can be accessed at [ICAFS archives](https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/about/archive/). ICAFS2021 was held virtual online ([\>>More details](/2021/program/130.html)). [Previous ICAFS were succesfully held](https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/about/archive/) virtual online (2021, 2020), in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia (2019), Istanbul, Turkey (2018) and Lahore, Pakistan (2017). 
 
**_Publication_** 
 Accepted abstracts will be published in conference abstract book. 
 After author's extension and peer-review by the committee, selected full papers related to agriculture, food, environment, etc., will be included in conference proceedings and sent for major databases such as Scopus, Ei Compendex, Web of Science-CPCI, etc, for indexation. Previous published proceedings: [ICAFS2020 EES V705](https://iopscience.iop.org/issue/1755-1315/705/1), [ICAFS2019 EES V559](https://iopscience.iop.org/issue/1755-1315/559/1). ([\>>More details](https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/cfp/)). 

_**Program**_ 
 The full conference days will be virtual **online** on Sept. 28-30, for detailed [program please refer here](https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/program/). 
 
 We look forward to having you join us for this fully online event ([\>>Register here](https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/registration/)), and will be reaching out with complete details and the updated program shortly, for more details about registration please visit at [ICAFS2022 registration page](https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/registration/). 
 Please also bring this notice to the attention of any of your colleagues who may be interested in participating in the conference ([Download Flyer](http://img.apaset.org/uploads/soft/ICAFS%5FFlyer.pdf "Please help circulate the conference information."), [Registration Form](http://img.apaset.org/uploads/soft/ICAFS%5FRegistration%5FForm.doc)). 
 
 Secretariat of ICAFS 2022

 On behalf of the Organizing Committee 

**Website**: <https://www.icafs.apaset.edu.kg/> 
**Secretariat Email**: icafs@apaset.org / icafs@apaset.edu.kg
